title: サイド

[[module css]]
#side-bar .scpnet-interwiki-wrapper iframe.scpnet-interwiki-frame {
    width: calc(100% + 10px);
    max-width: unset;
    margin: -5px;
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    #side-bar .scpnet-interwiki-wrapper iframe.scpnet-interwiki-frame{
         margin-bottom: 2em !important;
     }
}
[[/module]]
author: Dr Devan
